description: Address represents an address of a city object.

properties.name: objectId
properties.description: Specifies the identifier of the address that is unique within the database. Using a globally unique identifier is recommended.

properties.name: identifier
properties.description: Specifies an optional identifier of the address that is globally unique.

properties.name: codeSpace
properties.description: Specifies the code space of the identifier, typically a reference to the maintaining authority.

properties.name: street
properties.description: Specifies the name of the street.

properties.name: poBox
properties.description: Specifies the post office box number.

properties.name: city
properties.description: Specifies the name of the city.

properties.name: state
properties.description: Specifies the name of the state.

properties.name: country
properties.description: Specifies the name of the country.

properties.name: multiPoint
properties.description: Relates to the MultiPoint geometry of the Address. The geometry relates the address spatially to a city object.
